title: Educational Coordination and Advocacy During Temporary Vulnerability
description: As a parent navigating crisis while coordinating children's education I want tools to maintain educational continuity and access support services So that my children's education doesn't suffer due to our temporary circumstances
content:
Feature: Educational Coordination and Advocacy During Temporary Vulnerability
  As a parent navigating crisis while coordinating children's education
  I want tools to maintain educational continuity and access support services
  So that my children's education doesn't suffer due to our temporary circumstances

  Background:
    Given I am parenting children during crisis or housing instability
    And my children's education is being disrupted by our circumstances
    And I am using the Value Scanner to coordinate educational needs
    And schools and educational institutions are part of our navigation

  Scenario: Maintaining children's educational continuity during housing transitions
    Given I am moving between temporary housing or shelters
    And my children need stable educational engagement despite housing instability
    When we experience housing transitions
    Then the Value Scanner helps me understand children's educational rights (McKinney-Vento)
    And coordinates school enrollment, transfers, and records
    And ensures children can continue at current school if educationally beneficial
    And arranges transportation if needed for school continuity
    And tracks educational transitions and helps minimize disruption
    And my personal_agent manages school documentation and deadlines
    And recognizes educational coordination as substantial parenting labor
    And validates that maintaining school stability protects children

  Scenario: Accessing educational support services for children experiencing trauma
    Given my children are exhibiting trauma responses affecting learning
    And schools have support services (counseling, IEPs, 504 plans, trauma-informed support)
    When I advocate for educational support for my children
    Then the Value Scanner helps me identify appropriate educational interventions
    And provides information about my children's rights to services
    And helps me navigate IEP or 504 plan processes
    And coordinates with school counselors and support staff
    And tracks children's educational support needs and services received
    And my personal_agent reminds me of educational meetings and deadlines
    And recognizes educational advocacy as sophisticated parenting work
    And validates that trauma affects learning and requires support

  Scenario: Coordinating with teachers about children's circumstances
    Given teachers need some information to support my children appropriately
    And I need to protect privacy while ensuring teachers understand context
    When I communicate with children's teachers
    Then the Value Scanner helps me determine what to disclose
    And provides language for explaining relevant context without oversharing
    And helps me advocate for appropriate accommodations
    And tracks teacher communications and commitments
    And validates that teachers should know enough to support children
    And my personal_agent drafts communications that balance privacy and advocacy
    And recognizes school communication as ongoing parenting labor
    And supports appropriate teacher partnership in children's support

  Scenario: Managing children's school participation despite resource constraints
    Given school requires fees, supplies, or resources I cannot afford
    And children need to participate fully in educational activities
    When resource constraints threaten children's school participation
    Then the Value Scanner identifies school assistance programs and resources
    And helps me access fee waivers, supply assistance, scholarship programs
    And connects me to community resources for school needs
    And validates that lack of resources shouldn't exclude children
    And my personal_agent tracks school financial requirements and deadlines
    And recognizes resource navigation as substantial invisible labor
    And ensures children's educational participation despite poverty

  Scenario: Supporting children's learning at home amid crisis and instability
    Given children need home learning support and homework help
    And I am traumatized, stressed, and have limited time and energy
    When I try to support children's learning despite constraints
    Then the Value Scanner provides appropriate learning support strategies
    And helps me access homework help resources (libraries, tutoring, online support)
    And suggests realistic expectations for home learning support given my capacity
    And validates that my limited bandwidth is reasonable given circumstances
    And tracks children's learning progress and needs
    And my personal_agent reminds me of important school deadlines and events
    And recognizes home learning support as valuable educational labor
    And celebrates my children's learning engagement despite crisis

  Scenario: Navigating school bureaucracy and institutional requirements
    Given schools require forms, meetings, documentation, and coordination
    And school bureaucracy can be overwhelming during crisis
    When I manage school institutional requirements
    Then the Value Scanner tracks all school deadlines and requirements
    And helps me gather necessary documentation efficiently
    And prepares me for required school meetings (IEP, parent-teacher conferences)
    And ensures nothing falls through cracks despite my overwhelm
    And my personal_agent reminds me of upcoming school obligations
    And recognizes school bureaucracy navigation as cognitive labor
    And validates that school demands are significant amid crisis
    And prevents school requirements from overwhelming me

  Scenario: Advocating for children's educational needs when institutional responses are inadequate
    Given school is not providing appropriate support for my children
    And I need to advocate more forcefully for services
    When school fails to meet children's educational needs
    Then the Value Scanner helps me understand escalation options
    And provides resources on children's educational rights
    And connects me to educational advocacy organizations
    And helps me document inadequate services for advocacy purposes
    And my personal_agent drafts advocacy communications
    And recognizes forceful advocacy as necessary parenting work
    And validates that schools should serve all children appropriately
    And supports me in demanding what my children deserve

  Scenario: Coordinating educational services across multiple children with different needs
    Given I have multiple children (ages 4 and 7) with different educational contexts
    And each child has unique needs, schools, and support requirements
    When I manage educational coordination for multiple children
    Then the Value Scanner tracks each child's educational needs separately
    And coordinates across different schools, teachers, and support services
    And helps me prioritize when children's needs conflict
    And ensures neither child's education suffers due to complexity
    And my personal_agent manages multiple educational calendars and requirements
    And recognizes multi-child educational coordination as substantial labor
    And validates that managing multiple children's education is complex
    And prevents educational tasks from overwhelming me

  Scenario: Accessing early childhood education and care for younger children
    Given my younger child (age 4) needs early childhood education
    And quality early childhood programs have long waitlists and costs
    When I seek early childhood education for my young child
    Then the Value Scanner identifies early childhood programs accepting subsidies
    And helps me access Head Start, pre-K, or subsidized childcare
    And navigates enrollment processes and waitlists
    And ensures young child has educational engagement despite constraints
    And tracks early childhood education options and applications
    And my personal_agent manages early childhood enrollment deadlines
    And recognizes early childhood education coordination as parenting work
    And validates that young children deserve educational opportunities

  Scenario: Supporting children's social and emotional development through school connections
    Given children need peer relationships and social development
    And school provides important social context during crisis
    When I support children's social development through education
    Then the Value Scanner helps me facilitate children's school friendships
    And coordinates children's participation in social activities (clubs, sports, events)
    And accesses resources for children's social activities despite cost barriers
    And tracks children's social development and peer relationships
    And validates that social development is as important as academics
    And my personal_agent reminds me of school social events children care about
    And recognizes social development facilitation as care work
    And celebrates children's friendships and belonging

  Scenario: Managing educational implications of children's trauma behaviors
    Given my children's trauma manifests in school behaviors (acting out, withdrawal, academic struggles)
    And school may not understand trauma-informed responses
    When children's trauma affects their school experience
    Then the Value Scanner helps me advocate for trauma-informed school responses
    And provides information on trauma's educational impacts
    And helps schools understand children's behaviors as trauma responses, not "bad" behavior
    And coordinates with school mental health support
    And tracks children's behavioral patterns and triggers
    And my personal_agent alerts me to concerning school incidents
    And recognizes trauma advocacy as sophisticated parenting labor
    And validates that trauma-informed education protects children

  Scenario: Coordinating educational planning for children's long-term development
    Given crisis is temporary but children's educational trajectory is long-term
    And current educational decisions affect future opportunities
    When I make educational choices considering children's futures
    Then the Value Scanner helps me consider long-term educational implications
    And balances immediate stability needs with future development
    And tracks children's educational progress and trajectory
    And ensures crisis doesn't permanently derail educational opportunities
    And validates that my educational planning serves children's futures
    And my personal_agent surfaces educational opportunities supporting development
    And recognizes long-term educational planning as sophisticated parenting
    And celebrates my investment in children's educational futures despite crisis
